post.body: thanks for the add. Great fro, btw.

is organizing 74 cabins and 131 passengers worth of cruise paperwork. Didn't plan on thinking today, oh well.
is safely home from the insane madhouse known as Costco. Bit of advice, don't go, it's not worth it this time of year.
Enjoyed a great day watching a great fins win and then a great time out back with the wife and offspring. Beautiful day.
Loves NFL channel 702-1 on directv. Up to 8 hd games all at once. Let's go fins!!
is loving the blue sideline and endzone paint on the snowy NE field. Fins have a battle in the frozen KC day.
All right Miami!! Kick return and one play 7-0 fish!!! Temperature be damned.
is watching NFL network's pregame show, best in the biz. Ready for the fins game today and ready to torture Mope at Bonefish tonight.
